GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.42 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
watchdog: sp5100_tco: Fix a memory leak of EFCH MMIO resource

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 84ddf527f90755beec6b55ce2e31331f5ccd4e37, it was introduced in version v5.15.42 by commit b4c0f1600df43245c8c3425dbd9426fdfba6c4b2. For more details please see the references link.
